StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCommissioneeViewDistrict]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @District int, @OSS int = NULL AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, OC.CONTRACT_ID, C.COMMISSIONEE_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, CONVERT(CHAR(6), C.COMMISSION_DATE, 12) AS COMMISSION_DATE, TBS.CLASS AS TBS_CLASS, TBS.FY AS TBS_FY, FAP.ENROLLMENT_YEARS AS MCFAP_ENROLLMENT_YEARS, TAP.ENROLLMENT_YEARS AS MCTAP_ENROLLMENT_YEARS, CONVERT(CHAR(6), FIP.ENROLLMENT_DATE, 12) AS MCFIP_ENROLLMENT_DATE, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION AS DISPOSITION, OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OSS_ID, OSS.SHORT_NAME AS OSS_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION DIST INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP RS_M ON (DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID = @District AND DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID = RS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OSS_M ON (RS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = COALESCE(@OSS, OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID)) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION OSS ON OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN NWA N ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON N.NWA_ID = OC.NWA_ID INNER JOIN COMMISSIONEE C ON (OC.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID AND C.COMMISSION_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRECOMMISSION_DATA PCD ON OC.NWA_ID = PCD.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBS ON PCD.TBS_ID = TBS.TBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FIP_FAP_TAP FAP ON (C.CONTRACT_ID = FAP.CONTRACT_ID AND FAP.PROGRAM_TYPE = 'MCFAP') LEFT OUTER JOIN FIP_FAP_TAP TAP ON (C.CONTRACT_ID = TAP.CONTRACT_ID AND FAP.PROGRAM_TYPE = 'MCTAP') LEFT OUTER JOIN FIP_FAP_TAP FIP ON (C.CONTRACT_ID = FIP.CONTRACT_ID AND FAP.PROGRAM_TYPE = 'MCFIP')
